New Records: Highest PowerPlay total for India this World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh wins the toss and opts to bowl first.
India wanted to bat and got their wish.
Najmul Hossain Shanto says they aim to restrict India to 150-160.
Rohit Sharma: Assessing conditions quickly important.
Post-Match Reflections: India beat Bangladesh in a Super Eight Group 1 T20 World Cup 2024 match in Antigua on Saturday and remained unbeaten in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's highest PowerPlay score in this World Cup
Bangladesh's last result was a 9-wicket loss to India in Hangzhou 2023
Others: India's batting coach says Virat Kohli's early fall has been good for the middle order.
